roleset.name: mathematics

example.name: passive
example.text: It also could be a drag on Georgia-Pacific earnings because [the roughly $1.5 billion in goodwill -- the amount by which the bid exceeds Nekoosa's book value of $1.5 billion --]-1 will have *trace*-1 to be subtracted *trace*-1 from earnings over a period of decades.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: If the economy takes a major hit , more than just a mild recession , experts say you can subtract $ 1 trillion from the surplus .

roleset.note: SUBTRACT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'subtract' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, comparison with 'add'. (from subtract.01-v predicate notes)
